Articles.Content: So I understand that it is generally a good idea to have an actual scientist look at an experiment to glean the full data value but this makes conducting multiple experiments on a trip hard. Why not make each kerbal have a "science skill" just like their stupidity or courage and make it so that you can conduct an experiment and then as well as "transmit findings" have a "send to kerbal" option that allows you to get more science presuming the capsule that the kerbal is in survives? Just a thought. Incidentally, loving the update.
